item.title: Is my runserver is messed up?
item.dc:creator: @andrew01292 andrew01292
item.description:
@andrew01292 wrote:

I have jdk 6 update 3. @echo off title GangScape v2 Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server This is my runserver.bat (Im using gangscape v2 cuz thats what all my friends like) and I changed it to @echo off title GangScape v2 Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0_03-ga-bin.jar server and it didnt work
